title: wait, why not just make skins for champions on their birthdays/birthday month
body: this would keep champions like {{champion:69}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:112}} from not getting skins for years

replies.body:
137 skins a year baby.
Sorry 143 with SKT skins included.

> [{quoted}](name=MysterQ,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=TE8WAbkE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-28T02:38:54.728+0000)
>
> 137 skins a year baby.
> Sorry 143 with SKT skins included.

Also don't forget you would need to add the once a year Ultimate Skin, Victorious Skin and Championship skin as well.
